name: QiniuSpeed for WordPress
author: Hong Jian Qiang

sections.description:
1) Break through the server maximum upload file size limit!
2) Now,Qiniu provide free 10GB space.it means that you will have the accessory space free 10GB!
3) Implementation of WordPress static file CDN acceleration, maximum speed up access!
4) All of media file operations can be done in WordPress back-stage management, without login FTP when upload large file!
5) Save a lot of money to buy server space and bandwidth!

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to ‘Qiniu Cloud Storage’ menu to set.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:

  • fix some bug.
  • Remove Ajax upload.
  • Add callback from qiniu.com display.

1.2

  • fix some bug.

1.1

  • Use Ajax upload.
  • fix some bug.

1.0

  • QiniuSpeed Release.

short_description: Base on [Qiniu.com] cloud storage remote attachment plugin.You can break through the server maximum upload file size limit and speed up your blog!!!

1) Break through the server maximum upload file size limit!

3) Implementation of WordPress static file CDN acceleration, maximum speed up access!
4) All of media file operations can be done in WordPress back-stage management, without login FTP when upload large file!
